mapper.insert: insert into t_order_list (order_id,thirdpart_order_id,insurance_company,req_branch,compulsory_prop_no,business_prop_no,compulsory_policy_no,business_policy_no,insure_city,car_plate_no,has_plate,total_price,order_status,create_time,update_time) values ( #{orderId}, default, #{thirdpartOrderId}, default, #{insuranceCompany}, default, #{reqBranch}, default, #{compulsoryPropNo}, default, #{businessPropNo}, default, #{compulsoryPolicyNo}, default, #{businessPolicyNo}, default, #{insureCity}, default, #{carPlateNo}, default, #{hasPlate}, default, #{totalPrice}, default, #{orderStatus}, default, #{createTime}, default, #{updateTime} default )
